command: if(Test-Path 'C:\mount\Windows\Setup\Scripts\SetupComplete.cmd'){$before=(Get-FileHash 'C:\mount\Windows\Setup\Scripts\SetupComplete.cmd' -Algorithm SHA256).Hash}else{$before=''}; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'C:\mount\Windows\Setup\Scripts' -Force | Out-Null; Set-Content 'C:\mount\Windows\Setup\Scripts\SetupComplete.cmd' 'REM post-install hook'; $after=(Get-FileHash 'C:\mount\Windows\Setup\Scripts\SetupComplete.cmd' -Algorithm SHA256).Hash; if($before -ne $after){Write-Output 'SetupComplete.cmd created/modified'}; certutil -hashfile C:\mount\Windows\Setup\Scripts\SetupComplete.cmd SHA256
explanation: Drops or modifies SetupComplete.cmd within the offline image to ensure post-install execution and verifies the change via hashing, exemplifying image modification per T1601.
rationale_steps: Ensure Scripts directory exists in the image.
Hash and compare to confirm modification and record via certutil.
